div.div:
acts as a mediator
while handling events

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: left;
div.div:
One clock cycle:
1. Tick clock and generate events
in response
2. Handle previously generated events
(and events generated in the meantime)
(3. Redraw UI)
4. Sleep till next tick

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
